events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago and my package still hasn’t arrived. The tracking information hasn’t been updated for days.
The reported issue has been categorized as a delivery delay due to late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specializing in delivery issues to provide assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your package has not arrived yet. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can check the status with the shipping company?
Sure, my order number is 56789 and the tracking number is XYZ123. The last update was five days ago and it still says 'in transit.'
I contacted the courier and found that your package was delayed due to a logistical issue. We have expedited your delivery and it should arrive within 3 business days.
Thank you for checking on this and expediting the delivery. I appreciate the quick response and hope to receive it soon.
Your delivery issue has been resolved with the courier confirming an expedited shipment. Please let us know if you do not receive your package within 3 business days.
Just following up to ensure your package has arrived safely and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your delivery has been confirmed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
